mapper.update: update invest_contaminant set pointId = #{pointid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cas = #{cas,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, concentration = #{concentration,jdbcType=REAL}, control_val = #{controlVal,jdbcType=REAL}, screening_val = #{screeningVal,jdbcType=REAL}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, pointId, `name`, cas, concentration, control_val, screening_val, unit, `type` from invest_contaminant where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, pointId, `name`, cas, concentration, control_val, screening_val, unit, `type` from invest_contaminant
